author: SteveL-MSFT
body: In preparation for another PR where I need another test exe, it made sense to have just a single one rather than multiple.  Combined the previous echoargs and createchildprocess test exes into a single TestExe that can be extended for other tests.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT Sorry, most of my comments go beyond your changes.

title: Consolidated the two test exes into one
